description: Creates a segment definition associated to the given domain.

parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The unique name of the domain.

parameters.name: SegmentDefinitionName
parameters.description: The unique name of the segment definition.

parameters.name: DisplayName
parameters.description: The display name of the segment definition.

parameters.name: SegmentGroups
parameters.description: Specifies the base segments and dimensions for a segment definition along with their respective relationship. Groups (list) --- Holds the list of groups within the segment definition. (dict) --- Contains dimensions that determine what to segment on. Dimensions (list) --- Defines the attributes to segment on. (dict) --- Object that holds what profile and calculated attributes to segment on. ProfileAttributes (dict) --- Object that holds the profile attributes to segment on. AccountNumber (dict) --- A field to describe values to segment on within account number. The action to segment on. The values to apply the DimensionType on. (string) --- AdditionalInformation (dict) --- A field to describe values to segment on within additional information. The action to segment with. (string) --- FirstName (dict) --- A field to describe values to segment on within first name. (string) --- LastName (dict) --- A field to describe values to segment on within last name. (string) --- MiddleName (dict) --- A field to describe values to segment on within middle name. (string) --- GenderString (dict) --- A field to describe values to segment on within genderString. (string) --- PartyTypeString (dict) --- A field to describe values to segment on within partyTypeString. (string) --- BirthDate (dict) --- A field to describe values to segment on within birthDate. (string) --- PhoneNumber (dict) --- A field to describe values to segment on within phone number. (string) --- BusinessName (dict) --- A field to describe values to segment on within business name. (string) --- BusinessPhoneNumber (dict) --- A field to describe values to segment on within business phone number. (string) --- HomePhoneNumber (dict) --- A field to describe values to segment on within home phone number. (string) --- MobilePhoneNumber (dict) --- A field to describe values to segment on within mobile phone number. (string) --- EmailAddress (dict) --- A field to describe values to segment on within email address. (string) --- PersonalEmailAddress (dict) --- A field to describe values to segment on within personal email address. (string) --- BusinessEmailAddress (dict) --- A field to describe values to segment on within business email address. (string) --- Address (dict) --- A field to describe values to segment on within address. City (dict) --- The city belonging to the address. (string) --- Country (dict) --- The country belonging to the address. (string) --- County (dict) --- The county belonging to the address. (string) --- PostalCode (dict) --- The postal code belonging to the address. (string) --- Province (dict) --- The province belonging to the address. (string) --- State (dict) --- The state belonging to the address. (string) --- ShippingAddress (dict) --- A field to describe values to segment on within shipping address. (string) --- MailingAddress (dict) --- A field to describe values to segment on within mailing address. (string) --- BillingAddress (dict) --- A field to describe values to segment on within billing address. (string) --- Attributes (dict) --- A field to describe values to segment on within attributes. (string) --- (dict) --- Object that segments on various Customer Profile's fields. (string) --- CalculatedAttributes (dict) --- Object that holds the calculated attributes to segment on. (string) --- (dict) --- Object that segments on Customer Profile's Calculated Attributes. The values to apply the DimensionType with. (string) --- ConditionOverrides (dict) --- Applies the given condition over the initial Calculated Attribute's definition. Range (dict) --- The relative time period over which data is included in the aggregation for this override. The start time of when to include objects. End (integer) --- The end time of when to include objects. The unit for start and end. SourceSegments (list) --- Defines the starting source of data. (dict) --- The source segments to build off of. SegmentDefinitionName (string) --- The unique name of the segment definition. SourceType (string) --- Defines how to interact with the source data. Type (string) --- Defines how to interact with the profiles found in the current filtering. Include (string) --- Defines whether to include or exclude the profiles that fit the segment criteria.
